# IODispatchQueueCancelHandler

**Type Alias**

A block to execute when a canceled dispatch queue stops executing tasks.

## Declaration

```swift
typedef void (^)(void) IODispatchQueueCancelHandler;
```

## Stopping the Queue

- **Cancel**: Stops the queue from dequeueing any further tasks, and notifies the specified handler when all in-flight tasks finish.
